sense.def:
To commend someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj uradno pohvaliti pred drugimi.

seg.quote: I was commended for my reports.
Rothermere commended Baldwin to his readers as a great man.
His action earned the personal commendation of the prime minister.
...a degree of duty and devotion which deserves commendation.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
commends itself to someone
, neki človek tisto odobrava.

seg.quote: The defence would scarcely commend itself even to other lawyers.
